LuaAPI
public static
LuaAPI
Functions
Expose
[LuaAPIHidden]
public static void Expose(
Script script
)

Exposes public static methods in the LuaAPI class to the specified Lua script environment. Methods marked with the [LuaAPIHidden] attribute will not be exposed.

Parameters
script
Script

The MoonSharp.Interpreter.Script instance to expose the methods to.
